text: Ciril Zlobec (4 July 1925 â€“ 24 August 2018) was a Slovene poet, writer, translator, journalist and former politician. He was best known for his poems and published several volumes of poetry. In 1990 he became a member of the Presidency of Slovenia at a critical time for Slovene independence.Slovenska Pomlad (Slovenian Spring) site, National Museum of Contemporary History In the 1970s and 1980s, he was the editor of the intellectual and cultural journal Sodobnost.
